translations: n.行为，行动；契约，证书；功绩，英勇事迹

phrs.translation: 信托书，委托书；信托契约
v. 产生效果；付诸行动

sentences.sentence: He is all talk and no deed.
My grandmother says a good deed is its own reward.
sentences.translation: 我的奶奶说，做好事本身就是一种回报。

sentences.sentence: Smith changed his name by deed poll to Jervis-Smith.
sentences.translation: 史密斯通过单边契据将自己的名字更改为杰维斯—史密斯。
